item.title: 13K pounds of ready-to-eat grilled chicken breasts recalled over possible listeria contamination
item.description: More than 13,000 pounds of grilled chicken breasts distributed to seven states were recalled over concerns they may be contaminated with listeria.

item.title: AI raises average wages by 21% and substantially reduces' wage inequality, researchers find
item.description: Artificial intelligence "substantially reduces wage inequality while raising average wages by 21 percent," a new working paper published this week say...

item.title: US CEOs fear economic uncertainty more than their global peers as they head into 2026
